casebody.data:
No. 09-8917. Thomas L. Bates, Petitioner v. United States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois. 559 U.S. 989, 130 S. Ct. 1755,

176 L. Ed. 2d 209,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2251. March 8, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Cirtcuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
